content: SID 8-22 7/16“ Impact Driver Ultimate class cordless impact driver for large diameter drilling and fastening ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Impact drivers and wrenches- - - ### FEATURES:Features Work faster and smarter – get up to 50% faster driving speed, with two speeds and lower torque for greater control Smaller and more ergonomic design – more compact body allows for greater ease and comfort Work anytime – powerful LED light on the impact driver illuminates your jobsite day and night Applications Ideal for heavy-duty wood drilling and fastening for utility poles and structural wood bolt connections Drilling, fastening and bolting hardware in wood utility poles and timber ### TECHNICAL DATA: Chuck type: 7/16 hexagonal Feature: Powerful high efficiency hammering mechanism No load RPM: gear 1: 1700 rpm; gear 2: 1200 rpm Technical Data | Feature | Powerful high efficiency hammering mechanism | Chuck type | 7/16 hexagonal | No load RPM | gear 1: 1700 rpm; gear 2: 1200 rpm | Maximum torque | 4425 in-lb (1); 8850 in-lb (2) | 1 | Full hammering frequency | 3400 impacts/minute | Number of gears | 2 | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 7.3 x 2.9 x 7.8 in | Tool body weight | 6.2 lb | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 98 dB (A) | 2 | Do not use the tool for applications where an exact torque or maximum torque is specified - there is a risk of over-tightening and damaging the screw or workpiece. | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 2351737 - SID 8-22 7/16 impact driver - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SID 8-22 02 Cordl. impact driver
